DOC.brief_summary: To investigate the effect of the P-gp inducer rifampicin on the pharmacokinetic parameters of nintedanib
DOC.brief_title: Relative Bioavailability of a Single Dose of Nintedanib Given Alone and in Combination With Multiple Doses of Rifampicin
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criteria: 1. Healthy male subjects Exclusion criteria: 1. Any relevant deviation from healthy conditions
